alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Johnson; Logan (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 2:34PM CDT until June 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam affecting Logan, Franklin and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 357.0 feet, flooding affects agricultural use lands along the river downstream of the lock and dam in Franklin County. Gas fields are also subject to flooding downstream. Equipment and livestock should be moved to higher ground. North 5th Street in Logan County near the Six Mile Levee begins to flood and may cut off access to a nearby residence. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 357.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 358.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 357.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
